snippet: More than 10,000 Iranians, many chanting “Down With America,” rallied Tuesday in Tehran to mark the anniversary of the 1979 takeover of the United States Embassy.
abstract: More than 10,000 Iranians rally in Tehran to mark anniversary of 1979 takeover of the United States Embassy; crowd is smaller than in past years, reflecting dwindling enthusiasm for annual show of America-bashing.
lead_paragraph: More than 10,000 Iranians, many chanting “Down With America,” rallied Tuesday in Tehran to mark the anniversary of the 1979 takeover of the United States Embassy.
